forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind around 15 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 29. Northwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the hushed hours of the night linger over Boston, a cloak of clouds has settled in, wrapping the city in a cool embrace. The temperature is poised to dip, drifting down to about 20 degrees, accompanied by a brisk west wind that whispers promises of the morning chill. The streets, muted by the soft glow of streetlights, offer a stillness that invites contemplation. At this hour, an expedition outdoors might call for layers—perhaps a woolen hat and a warm scarf to guard against the bite of the wind, while a sturdy jacket provides solace from the dusk.

Awakening to a new day, the sun will ascend over the horizon, chasing away the clouds to reveal a brilliant blue sky. It is a forecast of clear, sunny weather, where Boston stretches wide under shafts of golden light and the northwest wind orchestrates a lively dance of leaves and layers. The day will reach a high around 29 degrees, rejuvenating the earlier gloom into an invigorating canvas, perfect for a brisk stroll along the Charles or a leisurely coffee at a local café. Donning a lighter jacket and comfy shoes will serve well, ensuring one feels both at ease and ready to embrace the vibrant rhythm of the day. Such a morning calls for quiet discoveries—perhaps exploring an undiscovered bookshop or savoring a moment at a favorite park bench, breathing in the crisp air that heralds new possibilities.
